text:
Have you ever hardly cared about your food diet? Most people don't. They forget what they eat on next day, like me. Why would we care about our food diet? (Actually I don't care too,) But there are a lot of things to think about our food diet. I will show my three day's (unhealthy) diet and tell why it's important to care our diet.
 First day, I ate mi-yuk-gok, kimchi and egg fry for my first meal, lunch. Mi-yuk-gok have a lot of calcium(?). Clacium makes our bone hard and healthy. Mi-yuk-gok is definetly healthy and good for our body, but if we eat a lot, it will make tummy ache. Kimchi makes our body part which consumes food good things healthy. But kimchi too, if we eat a lot, it makes your teeth yellow. Egg fry has a lot proteins. It's good to eat a lot of it but don't forget to wash your hands and egg shell clean before you crack the egg and after you do( If you want more with this imformation, search 'Why do we have to wash eggs before cracking?')! For the dinner, I ate Kimchi-duenjuang-gok and black rice. Kimchi-duenjuang-gok too is a very healthy korean food. Kimchi-duenjuang-gok has many vegetables and it is healthy. While making it, make sure you donot put too much of salt or pepper. It can make you bit fat and unhealthy, so becareful of it's recipe! Consuming black rice instead of white rice helps you dieting and makes your heart healthy. But people who have weak consuming(?) skills can be little dangerous. For snack, I ate three Aces. Ace is very delicious, but when we eat it a lot, we can be fat and unhealthy.
 Second day,( which is two days later,) I woke up late and ate Mi-yuk-gok. Then after hours later, I ate 'healthy ingreadient' salt bread which is very tasty. But eating salt bread instead of eating original diet can be very dangerous. It easily make high blood amount..? and change our taste(?). For my dinner, I ate fry kimchi-bock-um-bab. Eating it is healthy but this too, eating a lot can make our body fat.
 Last day, which is three days later, I woke up very early and ate a egg, two strawberry, two pieces of sweatpotato and two pieces of banana. Boiled eggs are veeeeery good for our body. It is more good then fryed egg. Strawberry and banana is fruit..? vegetable..? and um it is healthy. Strawberry and banana make our body not tire. You can think of it like little bit of very healthy coffee. Sweatpotato make faster of food's broken down project. For lunch, I ate egg-kim-bok-um-bab. This menu is very easy to make! So I like it. This has many protiens. It is very very delicious!! For dinner at last, I ate bean noodles(?). Bean noodle's soup is made of beans. This noodle's soup is very healthy and tastey. But it can be dangerous to eat on Summer even it is one of the Summer's main recipies.
 Foods which is healthy on my three days: egg, fry, egg-kim-bock-um-bab, kimchi-bok-um-bab, mi-yuk-gok, kimchi-duenjuang-gok, black rice, banana, strawberry, sweatpotato, and bean noodle soup
 Foods which is unhealthy on my three days: three Ace, salt bread(only two things?????)
 Foods are things which makes our energys and to live. But lot of it makes ourselves unhealthy. Eating too little bit is also very unhealthy for our body. Eating salty will make your blood degree high. Eating too spicy will damage your stomach. So, try to take care of your diet. That way, you will be more healthier and happier! (Recipie for egg-kim-bok-um-bab: 1.put hot rice on big bowl. 2. add sesame oil and soy sauce 3.mixmixmixmix 4. add seaweed flakes a lot. 5. make soft-boiled fry 6.mixmixmixmix)
correctText:
Have you ever hardly cared about your food diet? Most people don't. They forget what they eat the next day, like me. Why would we care about our food diet? Actually, I don't care either, but there are a lot of things to think about regarding our food diet. I will show my three-day (unhealthy) diet and explain why it's important to care about our diet.
 First day, I ate mi-yuk-gok, kimchi, and egg fry for my first meal, lunch. Mi-yuk-gok has a lot of calcium. Calcium makes our bones hard and healthy. Mi-yuk-gok is definitely healthy and good for our body, but if we eat a lot, it will cause a tummy ache. Kimchi makes the part of our body that consumes food healthy. However, kimchi can also make your teeth yellow if we eat too much. Fried eggs have a lot of protein. It's good to eat a lot of them, but don't forget to wash your hands and the eggshell thoroughly before you crack the egg and after you do. If you want more information on this, search "Why do we have to wash eggs before cracking?" For dinner, I ate kimchi doenjang guk and black rice. Kimchi doenjang guk is also a very healthy Korean food. It contains many vegetables and is nutritious. While making it, make sure you do not put too much salt or pepper. It can make you a bit fat and unhealthy, so be careful with its recipe! Consuming black rice instead of white rice helps with dieting and makes your heart healthy. However, people who have weak eating skills can be at a little risk. For a snack, I ate three Aces. Ace is very delicious, but when we eat it a lot, we can become fat and unhealthy.
 Second day, which is two days later, I woke up late and ate Mi-yuk-gok. Then, after a few hours, I ate 'healthy ingredient' salt bread, which is very tasty. However, eating salt bread instead of the original diet can be very dangerous. It can easily increase blood pressure and change our taste. For my dinner, I ate fried kimchi-bokkeumbap. Eating it is healthy, but eating a lot can also make our body fat.
 Last day, which is three days later, I woke up very early and ate an egg, two strawberries, two pieces of sweet potato, and two pieces of banana. Boiled eggs are very good for our bodies. They are better than fried eggs. Strawberries and bananas are fruits... or vegetables...? and um, they are healthy. Strawberries and bananas help our bodies not to feel tired. You can think of it as a little bit of very healthy coffee. Sweet potatoes speed up the breakdown of food. For lunch, I ate egg kim bokkeumbap. This menu is very easy to make! So I like it. This has many proteins. It is very, very delicious! For dinner, at last, I ate bean noodles. Bean noodle soup is made of beans. This noodle soup is very healthy and tasty. But it can be dangerous to eat in the summer, even though it is one of the summer's main recipes.
 Foods that are healthy for my three days: egg, fried egg, kimchi fried rice, miyeokguk, kimchi doenjang guk, black rice, banana, strawberry, sweet potato, and bean noodle soup.
 Foods that are unhealthy in my three days: three Aces, salt bread (only two things?????)
 Foods are things that make our energy and allow us to live. However, a lot of them can make us unhealthy. Eating too little is also very unhealthy for our bodies. Eating too much salt will raise your blood pressure. Eating too spicy food will damage your stomach. So, try to take care of your diet. That way, you will be healthier and happier!

(Recipe for egg-kim-bok-um-bab: 1. Put hot rice in a big bowl. 2. Add sesame oil and soy sauce. 3. Mix, mix, mix, mix. 4. Add a lot of seaweed flakes. 5. Make a soft-boiled egg. 6. Mix, mix, mix, mix.)
